description: Image component for displaying photos, graphics, icons, logos, and visual content. Supports responsive sizing and accessibility through alt text.
useCase: Use for hero images, product photos, team pictures, logos, decorative graphics, and any visual content. Always provide descriptive alt text for accessibility.

src.description: Image source URL (relative or absolute path)

alt.description: Alternative text for accessibility and SEO (required)

class.description: CSS classes for responsive sizing and styling

automation.semanticRole: Display visual content with accessibility metadata
automation.note: Images are non-interactive but should have meaningful alt text. Can be wrapped in Link for clickable images.
